column4: are there anway to change the default program entries to open a specific mime-type?
are there anway to change the default program entries to open a specific mime-type?

system-wide, they're registered (claimed?) by various .desktop files under /usr/share/applications/  .. I don't know if there's a cleaner way than simply editing the MimeType lines in those  (other than just removing the app you don't wish to use)
